content: [AUCTION] Mixed Media Embroidery Artwork - "BitcoinBird"Condition: MINT 100%HandMade by 5KsanaIf you have caught a BitcoinBird, so do not keep it inside a cage, do not make it be eager to fly away, but can not. Keep it the way it can be free to leave, but does not want to.Material: -   piece of fabric;-   beads;-   sequins;-   crystal;-   metallic theards;-   physical coins (7 pcs.) of  Bitcoin ( Denarium 2015)-   wood frame .Dimension: wide – 35 cm; height – 55 cm.PS: A bird can fly away anywhere it wants, somebody consider it to be freedom, but true freedom is to have the place for coming back. My BitcoinBird wants to come to you.About ME https://5ksana.art/about/ You can see my other artworks BITCOINART on my website https://5ksana.art/category/bitcoinart/ BTC_______________________________________________________________________________ ____________________________________Bid Format: Bids only in BTCReserve Price:  0.03 BTCStarting Bid: 0,03 BTC                             Bid Inc.: 0.002 BTCAuction Ends:  Friday, June  17th  12:00 PSTDelivery: International – Free (EMS).

comments.author: aoluain
comments.body: Quote from: 5Ksana_HandMade on June 15, 2022, 12:47:33 PMQuote from: MoparMiningLLC on June 15, 2022, 12:45:12 PMwasn't asking for proof of the work - was simply pointing out you called it a painting and this is quite a bit more than a painting.Artwork  Mopar was pointing out that your thread title is incorrect, what youare auctioning is not a "Painting". You can call it Embroidery, Beadwork,Mixed Media and/or Artwork. For example:[AUCTION] Mixed Media Embroidery Artwork - "BitcoinBird"The piece is very interesting and looks very nice, well executed and  Ifigure quite time consuming. Best of luck with the auction.
